typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{$dtid} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		EMT as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		PowerOn as string,
		ServoName as string,
		PowerOnTm as string,
		CuttingTm as string,
		CycleRunTm as string,
		CurrenttoolNo as string,
		MaxAxisNo as string,
		UseAxisNo as string,
		CNCMode as string,
		MainProgram as string,
		NowProgram as string,
		ProgramStep as string,
		Singlenote as string,
		Programnote as string,
		EventTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> srccncstatus
srccncstatus sink(input(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		ApplicationTime as string,
		EmployeeName as string,
		MachineType as string,
		OrderNumber as string,
		ProcessName as string,
		Building as string,
		Area as string,
		MachineID as string,
		CutterNumber as string,
		WorkflowStatus as string,
		CutterSpecification as string,
		CutterProcessLife as string,
		CutterName as string,
		EmployeeID as string,
		ExchangeReason as string,
		CutterStandardLife as string,
		ExchangeReasonDetails as string,
		Manufacturer as string,
		IPQCNumber as string,
		Calibrator as string,
		Size as string,
		Appearance as string,
		ReviewDetails as string,
		Creator as string,
		ConfirmationDetails as string,
		ReviewResult as string,
		IPQCName as string,
		IsCompliant as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['partition-data.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		ApplicationTime,
		MachineType,
		OrderNumber,
		ProcessName,
		Building,
		Area,
		MachineID,
		CutterNumber,
		WorkflowStatus,
		CutterSpecification,
		CutterProcessLife,
		CutterName,
		EmployeeID,
		ExchangeReason,
		CutterStandardLife,
		ExchangeReasonDetails,
		Manufacturer,
		IPQCNumber,
		Calibrator,
		Size,
		Appearance,
		ReviewDetails,
		ConfirmationDetails,
		ReviewResult,
		IsCompliant
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PartitionDataSetCDM
